summary: This document appears to be a financial statement from J.P. Morgan for Southern Financial, LLC, covering the period from July 1, 2013, to July 31, 2013. It includes account summaries and details about various personnel involved in client services and investment management.

persons.name: Justin Nelson
persons.context: Justin Nelson is identified as a banker associated with the account summary in the document.

persons.name: Paul Barrett
persons.context: Paul Barrett is mentioned as an investment specialist in the context of managing holdings.

persons.name: Janet Young
persons.context: Janet Young is part of the client service team, involved in equity management.

persons.name: Gina Meghocco
persons.context: Gina Meghocco is also part of the client service team, focusing on alternative assets.

persons.name: Jason Grosse
persons.context: Jason Grosse is mentioned as part of the client service team, dealing with cash and fixed income.

keyFacts: The document is a financial statement from J.P. Morgan for Southern Financial, LLC.
The statement covers the period from July 1, 2013, to July 31, 2013.
Several staff members are mentioned in relation to client services and investment management.
